headline: Wall Street Targets Breakout Gold Producers as Bull Market Accelerates
summary: With gold soaring past $3,000 per ounce in May 2025 — outperforming NASDAQ, the S&P 500, and even bitcoin — Wall Street's attention is shifting. As U.S. debt-to-GDP climbs above 120% and real interest rates remain negative, gold continues to prove itself as the market's most dependable hedge. Yet for institutional investors, traditional holdings such as bullion and ETFs no longer offer enough upside. Today's focus is on leverage, scalability and consistent cash flow, providing an ideal opportuni
